title: Collect Taxes
description: Tax collectors travel through the lands to collect funds for the betterment of the kingdom. Attempt a basic check.

criticalSuccess.msg: Your tax collectors are wildly successful! For the remainder of the Kingdom turn, gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Economy-based checks.

success.msg: Your tax collectors gather enough to grant you a +1 circumstance bonus to Economy-based checks for the remainder of the Kingdom turn. If you attempted to Collect Taxes during the previous turn, <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Unrest</button>

failure.msg: Your tax collectors gather enough to grant you a +1 circumstance bonus to Economy-based checks for the remainder of the Kingdom turn. In addition, people are unhappy about taxesâ€”<button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="1">Gain 1 Unrest</button> (or <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="2">Gain 2 Unrest</button> if you attempted to Collect Taxes the previous turn).

criticalFailure.msg: Your tax collectors encounter resistance from the citizens and their attempts to gather taxes are rebuffed. While the tax collectors still manage to gather enough taxes to support essential government, they have angered the kingdom's citizens and encouraged rebellious acts. <button type="button" class="km-gain-lose" data-type="unrest" data-mode="gain" data-turn="now" data-multiple="false" data-value="2">Gain 2 Unrest</button>, and choose one Ruin to increase by 1.
